amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding fire protection in Department of Defense facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1034 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1034 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Strange to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5794) To express the sense of Congress regarding fire protection in Department of Defense facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1034 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1034 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Strange to Amendment SA 1003.
